Package nom.tam.fits

Class HeaderCardCountingArrayDataInput

  • java.lang.Object
    • nom.tam.fits.HeaderCardCountingArrayDataInput
  • @Deprecated
public class HeaderCardCountingArrayDataInput
extends Object
    Deprecated.

    A helper class to keep track of the number of physical cards for a logical card.

    This class should not have public visibility. And really, the counting should be completely internalized by HeaderCard. Perhaps remove in a future major release.

    Author:
    Richard van Nieuwenhoven
